name: FollowAnalytics Insurance Heroku Demo
description: The central point of the Insurance demo provided by FollowAnalytics to illustrate integration between Heroku, Salesforce and FollowAnalytics

SALESFORCE_LOGIN.description: Your Salesforce login to allow data sync.

SALESFORCE_TOKEN.description: Your Salesforce token - see demo documentation for details.

SALESFORCE_APP_CLIENT_ID.description: The client ID obtained when configuring the FollowAnalytics AppExchange OAuth app.

SALESFORCE_APP_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret obtained when configuring the FollowAnalytics AppExchange OAuth app.
